title: Average age of players in Major League Baseball by club 2019
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Major League Baseball Player, and Average player age in years in each Major League Baseball Player on the y axis.
The maximum Average player age in years 30.1 is found at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and the minimum is found at Baltimore Orioles where Major League Baseball Player is 25.7.
There is a difference of 4.4 between the maximum Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and minimum Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.

max_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Major League Baseball Player, and Average player age in years in each Major League Baseball Player on the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
Major League Baseball Player Oakland Athletics has the second highest value for Average player age in years.
The difference of Average player age in years between the highest and lowest Major League Baseball Player is 4.4.

The Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals has the highest Average player age in years, followed by Oakland Athletics, and Houston Astros. Down to the Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles which is the lowest.
Similar Average player age in years is found in Major League Baseball Player Chicago Cubs, Atlanta Braves, and New York Yankees.
The Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals has 1.07 times more Average player age in years than average.
Summing up the values of all Major League Baseball Players, we get total 843.0.
